item.title: Watch us play Mario Kart World from the very start
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/06/05/watch-us-play-mario-kart-world-for-an-hour/

We got to get an early start on Mario Kart World last night, booting up our Nintendo Switch 2 and diving into the new generation open world kart racer from the very start.

We’d absolutely recommend watching this on as high a resolution TV or screen as possible, as the stream is available in full 4K to show off the game at its highest fidelity.

We sample a bit of the Grand Prix mode (where I drive really, really poorly), before hopping into a Knockout Tour, some of the open world Free Roam mode, and then wrapped things up just ahead of the PlayStation State of Play stream.

We’ll likely be streaming more of what we’re playing on Nintendo Switch 2 over the coming days on YouTube, so make sure to like, subscribe, click the bell icon and the usual things to get notifications. And obviously keep your eyes peeled for our full reviews of the Switch 2 launch titles.
